header.access: {app_name} wants to access your Funkwhale account

help.pasteCode: Copy-paste the following code in the application:
help.copyCode: You will be shown a code to copy-paste in the application

message.unknownPermissions: The application is also requesting the following unknown permissions:

message.unavailable: The Subsonic API is not available on this Funkwhale instance.

content.warning: This will completely disable access to the Subsonic API using from account.

newPassword.header: Request a new Subsonic API password?

content.warning: This will log you out from existing devices that use the current password.

link.apps: Discover how to use Funkwhale from other apps

subsonic.paragraph1: Funkwhale is compatible with other music players that support the Subsonic API.
subsonic.paragraph3: However, accessing Funkwhale from those clients requires a separate password you can set below.
subsonic.paragraph2: You can use those to enjoy your playlist and music in offline mode, on your smartphone or tablet, for instance.

header.appSecretWarning: Keep a copy of this token in a safe place.

help.appDetails: Application ID and secret are really sensitive values and must be treated like passwords. Do not share those with anyone else.

message.appSecretWarning: You won't be able to see it again once you leave this screen.

header.emailFailure: We cannot change your e-mail address
header.noApps: You don't have any application connected with your account.
header.noPersonalApps: You don't have registered any application yet.

description.changeEmail: Change the e-mail address associated with your account. We will send a confirmation to the new address.

changePassword.paragraph1: Changing your password will also change your Subsonic API password if you have requested one.
changePassword.paragraph2: You will have to update your password on your clients that use this password.

description.contentFilters: Content filters help you hide content you don't want to see on the service.
description.authorizedApps: This is the list of applications that have access to your account data.
description.yourApps: This is the list of applications that you have registered.
description.plugins: Use plugins to extend Funkwhale and get additional features.
description.deleteAccount: You can permanently and irreversibly delete your account and all the associated data using the form below. You will be asked for confirmation.

content.warning: Changing your password will have the following consequences
content.logout: You will be logged out from this session and have to log in with the new one
content.subsonic: Your Subsonic password will be changed to a new, random one, logging you out from devices that used the old Subsonic password

deleteAccount.header: Do you want to delete your account?

content.warning: This is irreversible and will permanently remove your data from our servers. You will be immediately logged out.
This will permanently remove the application and all the associated tokens.
This will prevent this application from accessing the service on your behalf.

help.noApps: If you authorise third-party applications to access your data, those applications will be listed here.
help.changePassword: Please double-check your password is correct
help.noPersonalApps: Register one to integrate Funkwhale with third-party applications.

warning.deleteAccount: Your account will be deleted from our servers within a few minutes. We will also notify other servers who may have a copy of some of your data so they can proceed to deletion. Please note that some of these servers may be offline or unwilling to comply though.

message.confirmDelete: Your deletion request was submitted, your account and content will be deleted shortly

header.confirm: Are you sure you want to log out?

message.loggedIn: You are currently logged in as {username}

scopes.description: Checking the parent "Read" or "Write" scopes implies access to all the corresponding children scopes.
scopes.label: Scopes

help.redirectUri: Use "urn:ietf:wg:oauth:2.0:oob" as a redirect URI if your application is not served on the web.

placeholder.username: Enter your username or e-mail address

help.approvalRequired: If you signed-up recently, you may need to wait before our moderation team review your account, or verify your e-mail address.
help.invalidCredentials: Please double-check that your username and password combination is correct and make sure you verified your e-mail address.

message.redirect: You will be redirected to {domain} to authenticate

header.login: Log in to your Funkwhale account

message.registrationClosed: Public registrations are not possible on this instance. You will need an invitation code to sign up.
message.requiresReview: Registrations on this pod are open, but reviewed by moderators before approval.
message.awaitingReview: Your account request was successfully submitted. You will be notified by e-mail when our moderation team has reviewed your request.
message.accountCreated: Your account was successfully created. Please verify your e-mail address before trying to login.
